name: BetterInputs
description: Makes inputs behave like on Windows (text highlighting, Ctrl+A, Ctrl+Arrow hotkeys, etc...)

auto-deselect.name: Auto deselect input
auto-deselect.description: <cr>Highly Experimental!</c> Automatically deselect the currently selected input when an alert or layer appears. (Fixes escape key deselecting the input instead of closing the opened alert/layer)

allow-any-character.name: Allow any character
allow-any-character.description: Allows inputting any character (even ones not allowed) into input nodes.
